name: Spaceship (m-bt)
description:
You are on a mission to collect as many toolkits as possible and deliver them to the control room. But this task may not be as easy as you think. Spaceship is leaking and the amount of oxygen is limited. You have to pay attention to its usage and find O2 bottles to take a deep breath. 

This game was out first project in Unreal Engine 4. It was also made entirely using Blueprints.

Controls ActionKeybindLook around
MouseMoveW, S, A, D
JumpSpacebarSprintLeft Shift
Pause Menu
Esc Created by
  • Michał Biernat
  • Anna Hosumbek
